name: World Aquaculture and Fisheries Conference
content: Magnus Group takes great pleasure to invite you for “World Aquaculture and Fisheries Conference” (WAC 2020) scheduled on May 20-21, 2020 in Tokyo, Japan. Aquaculture and Fisheries conference aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers, educators and research scholars to discuss latest trends, the most recent innovations and to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Aquaculture , Fisheries and Marine biology . Conference topics includes : Aquaculture and Fisheries, Sustainability in Aquaculture, Aquaculture Nutrition, Fish Genetics & Biotechnology , Fisheries Science, Marine Science and Marine Biologist , Fish Farming Techniques , Aquaculture Engineering , Disease Diagnosis & Management , Mariculture and Seaweed Culture , Freshwater Aquaculture , Marine Finfish Farming , Shellfish Farming , Integrated Aquaculture , Aquatic Toxicology , Oceanography and Limnology. Conference Venue: Tokyo, Japan For More details visit: https://worldaquacultureconference.com/ Contact Email: aquaculture@magnusmeetings.com Contact Phone: 1 (702) 988 2320 WhatsApp: +1-804-876-0431
